en.submittedAppStatusMsg: Your application was submitted on {{session.originalPetition.createdDate | date}}
en.submittedAppStatusMsgDetails: Your temporary reference number is {{ session.referenceNumber }}. Youâ€™ll be given a full case number when your application has been accepted and issued (sent by post to your {{ session.divorceWho }}).
en.submittedWhatHappensNextDetails1: If your application is accepted you'll be sent a notice saying that your application has been issued. You'll also get a case number and a copy of the application stamped by the divorce centre.
en.submittedWhatHappensNextDetails2: Your {{ session.divorceWho }} will also receive a copy of the application and a form to return. If you have used adultery as your reason for divorce, and named the person that your {{ session.divorceWho }} committed adultery with, they will also get a copy and a form to return.
en.submittedWhatHappensNextDetails3: Contact the divorce centre if you don't hear anything back after 3 weeks.
